alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 8:39AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard and south central Volusia Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 838 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Mims, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chuluota and Maytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Seminole
